name: intuitively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is based on feelings rather than facts or proof: I knew intuitively that something dreadful had happened to him. Intuitively, it makes sense to start the project now.
in a way that does not require any special knowledge when using something: In early tests, the patient was able to control the device intuitively. Users are quickly and intuitively directed to the information they seek. Related word
